thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Icade Has Repurchased 200 Million Euros under Bond Tender Offer‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Icade Has Repurchased 200 Million Euros under Bond Tender Offer‍​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - ICADE SA:
* COMPLETES BOND TENDER OFFER ‍​ * OF €371 MILLION TENDERED INTO OFFER, ICADE HAS REPURCHASED €200 MILLION
* AFTER TENDER OFFER, OUTSTANDING PRINCIPAL AMOUNTS OF BONDS IS €211,300,000 FOR THE ONE MATURING IN 2019‍​
* AFTER TENDER OFFER, OUTSTANDING PRINCIPAL AMOUNTS OF BONDS IS €304,600,000 FOR THE ONE MATURING IN 2021
* AFTER TENDER OFFER, OUTSTANDING PRINCIPAL AMOUNTS OF BONDS IS €483,900,000 FOR THE ONE MATURING IN 2022
* J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC AND NATIXIS ACTED AS BOOKRUNNERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
